mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS registerCount ,area FROM ( SELECT buyers.buyer_no AS buyerNo,buyers.`status` AS bstatus,buyers.buyer_code AS buyerCode , (case when (buyers.`source` = 1) then '后台' when (buyers.`source` = 2) then '门户' when (buyers.`source` = 3) then '移动端' end) AS `source`, (case when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 52) then '普通会员' when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 53) then '高级会员' end) AS `level`, buyers.created_at AS createdAt , areasBn.country_bn AS country, (CASE WHEN areasBn.country_bn ='China' THEN '中国' ELSE areasZh.name END ) as area FROM erui_buyer.buyer AS buyers LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country AS areasBn on buyers.country_bn=areasBn.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area AS areasZh ON areasBn.market_area_bn=areasZh.bn AND areasZh.lang='zh' WHERE buyers.deleted_flag='N' AND buyers.`status` = 'PASS' ) as a WHERE source IN ('后台','门户') AND bstatus <> 'REJECTED' and createdAt BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY area HAVING area IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(1) AS registerCount ,area FROM ( SELECT buyers.buyer_code AS buyerNo,buyers.id AS buyerId , (case when (buyers.`source` = 1) then '后台' when (buyers.`source` = 2) then '门户' when (buyers.`source` = 3) then '移动端' end) AS `source`, (case when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 52) then '普通会员' when (buyers.`buyer_level` = 53) then '高级会员' end) AS `level`, buyers.level_at AS level_at , areasBn.country_bn AS country, (CASE WHEN areasBn.country_bn ='China' THEN '中国' ELSE areasZh.name END ) as area FROM erui_buyer.buyer AS buyers LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country AS areasBn on buyers.country_bn=areasBn.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area AS areasZh ON areasBn.market_area_bn=areasZh.bn AND areasZh.lang='zh' WHERE buyers.deleted_flag='N' AND buyers.buyer_code IN (SELECT crm_code FROM erui_order.`order` WHERE order_category != 1 AND order_category != 3 AND order_belongs=1 AND crm_code <> '' AND crm_code IS NOT NULL) ) as a WHERE level IN ('普通会员','高级会员') and level_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY area HAVING area IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t1.serial_no) AS total, t3.`name` as area FROM erui_rfq.inquiry AS t1 LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country AS t2 ON t1.country_bn = t2.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area AS t3 ON t2.market_area_bn = t3.bn AND t3.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t3.lang = 'zh' WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.status <> 'DRAFT' AND EXISTS( SELECT inquiry_id FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log WHERE inquiry_id = t1.id AND action = 'CREATE' AND out_node = 'BIZ_DISPATCHING' GROUP BY inquiry_id HAVING MIN(out_at) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")) AND t3.bn IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t3.bn

SELECT count(id) AS total_num, sum( ifnull(total_quote_price, 0) ) AS total_price, countryCn AS area FROM ( SELECT t1.id, t2.total_quote_price, ( CASE t1.country_bn WHEN 'China' THEN '中国' ELSE t4. NAME END ) AS countryCn, t5.createAt FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_rfq.quote t2 ON t1.id = t2.inquiry_id, erui_operation.market_area_country t3, erui_operation.market_area t4, ( SELECT inquiry_id , out_at AS createAt FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log WHERE out_node ='MARKET_CONFIRMING' GROUP BY inquiry_id HAVING max(out_at) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s"))AS t5 WHERE t1.country_bn = t3.country_bn AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t3.market_area_bn = t4.bn AND t4.lang = 'zh' AND t5.inquiry_id=t1.id AND t1.`status` != 'DRAFT' AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED', 'COMPLETED') ) AS tb GROUP BY countryCn

SELECT countryCn AS area, COUNT(id) AS total_num , SUM(ifnull(total_price_usd, 0)) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT CASE t1.country WHEN 'China' THEN '中国' ELSE t2.name END AS countryCn, t1.id, t1.total_price_usd ,t3.start_date FROM erui_order.order t1, erui_operation.market_area t2 , erui_order.project t3 WHERE t1.region = t2.bn AND t3.order_id=t1.id AND t2.lang = 'zh' AND t1.order_category != 1 AND t1.order_category != 3 AND t1.status>2 AND t1.delete_flag=0 AND t3.start_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) tb GROUP BY countryCn

SELECT t5.name , COUNT(t5.inqId) AS total FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS inqId, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name, t4.diff FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' ,( SELECT inquiry_id , MIN(out_at) AS diff FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log WHERE in_node='DRAFT' OR out_node='BIZ_DISPATCHING' GROUP BY inquiry_id HAVING MIN(out_at) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") )AS t4 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.id = t4.inquiry_id AND t1.status != 'DRAFT' ) AS t5 GROUP BY t5.`name`

SELECT COUNT(t5.inqId) AS total_num, SUM(IFNULL(t5.total_quote_price, 0) ) AS total_price, t5. name FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS inqId, total_quote_price, t4.diff as createTime, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.`deleted_flag` = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_rfq.quote t3 ON t1.id = t3.inquiry_id AND t3.`deleted_flag` = 'N' ,(SELECT inquiry_id , MAX(out_at) AS diff FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log WHERE out_node = 'MARKET_CONFIRMING' GROUP BY inquiry_id HAVING MAX(out_at) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.id=t4.inquiry_id AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED', 'COMPLETED') ) AS t5 GROUP BY t5.`name`

SELECT org.`name`, SUM((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.out_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.into_at))) / 3600 AS diff FROM (SELECT inquiry.org_id, MAX(log1.out_at) AS out_at, MIN(log2.into_at) AS into_at FROM erui_rfq.inquiry inquiry, erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log log1, erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log log2, (SELECT inquiry_id AS log_inquiry_id FROM erui_rfq.inquiry_check_log WHERE out_node = 'MARKET_CONFIRMING' GROUP BY inquiry_id HAVING MIN(out_at) BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")) AS t3 WHERE t3.log_inquiry_id = inquiry.id AND inquiry.id = log1.inquiry_id AND inquiry.id = log2.inquiry_id AND log1.in_node = 'MARKET_APPROVING' AND log2.in_node = 'BIZ_DISPATCHING' GROUP BY inquiry.id , inquiry.org_id) t1, erui_sys.org AS org WHERE t1.org_id = org.id GROUP BY org.`name`

SELECT t4.name , COUNT(t4.oid) AS total_num ,SUM(IFNULL(t4.total_price, 0)) AS total_price FROM ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name, t1.id AS oid, t1.total_price_usd AS total_price FROM erui_order.order t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.business_unit_id = t2.id LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_order.project t3 ON t1.id=t3.order_id WHERE t1.status>2 AND t1.delete_flag=0 AND t1.order_category != 1 AND t1.order_category != 3 and t3.start_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name

SELECT t4.name ,COUNT(1) AS total FROM ( SELECT t1.id AS sid, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name
FROM erui_supplier.supplier t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t1.org_id = t2.id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' WHERE t1.status = 'APPROVED' AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.checked_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name

SELECT t2.name, COUNT(t1.spu) AS total_spu, SUM(t1.sku) AS total_sku FROM (SELECT spu, MAX(bizline_id) AS bizline_id, CONVERT( SUM(sku_count - sku_count_notvalid) / COUNT(id) , SIGNED) AS sku FROM erui_goods.product WHERE deleted_flag = 'N' AND `status` = 'VALID' AND created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") GROUP BY spu) AS t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN erui_sys.org t2 ON t2.id = t1.bizline_id AND t2.deleted_flag = 'N' GROUP BY t2.name

SELECT count(DISTINCT t4.spu) AS total_spu, t4.name FROM ( SELECT p.spu AS spu, ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name from erui_goods.product p LEFT JOIN erui_goods.show_cat_product scp on scp.spu=p.spu and scp.lang=p.lang and scp.onshelf_flag='Y' LEFT JOIN erui_operation.bizline t2 ON p.bizline_id=t2.id where p.deleted_flag='N' and p.lang='en' and scp.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name
SELECT id ,`name` FROM erui_operation.bizline

SELECT count(DISTINCT t4.sku) AS total_sku, t4.name FROM ( SELECT g.sku AS sku , ( CASE WHEN t2.name ='易瑞-电力电工（含钢丝绳索具）' THEN '易瑞-电力电工' WHEN t2.name ='油田设备事业部' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-石油钢管公司' OR t2.name = '油田设备事业部-通用设备公司' THEN '油田设备' WHEN t2.name ='康博瑞-商务技术' OR t2.name = '康博瑞-配件中心' THEN '康博瑞' ELSE t2.name END) AS name from erui_goods.goods g LEFT JOIN erui_goods.product p on p.spu=g.spu and p.lang=g.lang LEFT JOIN erui_goods.show_cat_goods scg on scg.sku=g.sku and scg.lang=g.lang and scg.onshelf_flag='Y' LEFT JOIN erui_operation.bizline t2 ON p.bizline_id=t2.id where g.deleted_flag='N' and p.deleted_flag='N' and g.lang='en' and scg.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") ) AS t4 GROUP BY t4.name

SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_all FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.status != 'DRAFT' AND t1.inquiry_source IN ('Mall' ,'Portal') AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_all FROM erui_rfq.inquiry t1 WHERE t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.quote_status IN ('QUOTED' , 'COMPLETED') AND t1.inquiry_source IN ('Mall' ,'Portal') AND t1.created_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

select count(1) as total FROM erui_order.order t1 , erui_order.project t3 where t3.order_id=t1.id AND t1.status>2 AND t1.delete_flag=0 AND t1.order_category != 1 AND t1.order_category != 3 AND t3.start_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")

SELECT COUNT(pv) AS pv, COUNT(uv) AS uv, SUM(avg_session_duration * sessions) / SUM(sessions) AS avgDur, AVG(bounce_rate) AS jump FROM erui_report.rep_daily_country_web_info WHERE day_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AND day_date <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT SUM(uv) AS uvCount, area_name AS area FROM erui_report.rep_daily_country_web_info WHERE day_date BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") AND area_bn is not null GROUP BY area_bn , area_name
